name: Car Speed: Need for Racing
description:
A game made in 48 hours
This is a game prototype, there will be no ads when playingI created a campaign on Indiegogo: become a backer

http://igg.me/at/trpgoutschool

Facebook: http://fb.com/trpgoutschool Twitter: https://twitter.com/@uhpd_games

FEATURES:
- 3 cars with completely different steering models;
- unique tracks;
- A driving model which connect best elements from simulation and arcade games
- Fun for play
- Vibrate, shake the screen to control the car
